space.gui.pipeline.viewable

Interface ViewableRoom

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Room

    public interface ViewableRoom
    A room that can be viewed. Has all the usual walls, floor and ceiling and also holds ViewableDoors and ViewableObjects
    Author:
    Simon Pinfold (300280028)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getLight

        Vector3D getLight()
        Get the amount and color of light in a room. the x,y and z components are red, green and blue respectively. Note that values of over 0.7 for a color can cause the exposure to look odd
        Returns:
        the light intensity and color of a room
